metadata.title: Belkin 4-Port USB Hub - Powered Desktop USB Docking Station - USB Adapter supports USB A, USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 - USB Charging Hub - USB Splitter for USB Drives, Keyboards and Mice - Powered USB Hub
features: EXPANDABLE CONNECTIVITY: Powered USB Hub lets you easily connect up to 4 USB A devices to your Mac or PC through a single open USB port
FAST TRANSFER SPEEDS: Ideal for connecting printers, storage devices, cameras, scanners and more, and delivers data transfer speeds of up to 480 Mbps through a USB cable
PLUG AND PLAY: Simply connect this USB splitter using the included USB cable, follow the on-screen instructions, and start connecting devices. No additional drivers are required
GREAT FOR ANY SITUATION: With a slim and stylish design this is the perfect USB adapter to expand the ports of your Macbook or Desktop PC in the office, at home, or on the go
BROAD COMPATIBILITY: 4 Port USB docking station supports USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 connections, and works with your PC or Mac
description: Expand the capabilities of your Mac or PC with the Belkin 4-Port USB Hub.

This high-speed USB hub connects easily to your Desktop PC, Mac Desktop or MacBook, adding 4 additional USB 2.0 ports to your computer. You won’t need to unplug one peripheral in order to use another after using this USB adapter. Easily connect to your computer using the included USB cable, and seamlessly pair with printers, storage drives, cameras, scanners, and more, all through a single cable.

With its sleek, modern design this USB splitter will expand your home laptop or office computer with four USB ports, supporting USB 2.0 and USB 1.1 standards. You’ll love how quickly you can transfer data or back up your files, as this USB charging station can quickly transfer data at up to 480 Mbps.

Easy in, easy out. The 4 port USB hub connects with a single USB cable, and after following the on screen instructions, users can begin connecting all their peripherals, with no external power supply required.
Compatible with Mac and PC computers. Package includes 4 Port USB Hub, and USB Cable.
